title: so cute
review: Good can overcome evil. If we help others and help others in our life, your life will be more glorious.

title: excellent
review: Make complaints about adorable portraits of these heroes, and the result is a clear division of labor and a lot of people. They are more attractive than those who watched a single movie before. The only regret is that the alien villain still hasn't broken away from the tradition of vermin image, and the spaceship looks like a prawn...

title: Looking forward to the sequel
review: In this movie, it shows the kindness and evil of human nature, some of them are willing to sacrifice themselves for family love and others are willing to harm others in order to survive. The most moving is the last scene. The voice of the little girl singing rings in the railway tunnel. The soldiers in the distance put down their guns and they were saved... I'm looking forward to the second one. The director regrets that he wrote Ggong dead, or there will be Ggong in the second one!

title: Never underestimate children
review: In the story, the parents leave the child alone at home, and the child breaks into two thieves when he is at home. The ghost child and the thief start a series of fights of wisdom and courage. I think this film, in addition to being funny, may also tell you that in fact, the child also has many surprises waiting for us to find. In fact, the child can do a lot, but they have always been Underestimated, try to let the child do it by himself, maybe he will exceed your imagination.

title: Everyone's future is full of infinite possibilities, but the premise is that you must have the spirit of Forrest Gump.
review: The kindness and warmth shown in the film touched the best things in the audience's heart and showed such beautiful emotions as honesty, trustworthiness, seriousness, courage and love. Forrest Gump is portrayed as the embodiment of virtue in the film. He is honest, trustworthy, earnest, brave and attaches great importance to feelings. He only knows how to give without asking for return and never mind others' rejection. He just faces life with open mind and magnanimity. He concentrated his only wisdom, faith and courage on one point. He didn't care about anything but ran on the road by intuition.

title: Amir plays the male leading role in three life segments of 19, 29 and 55 years old.unbelievable
review: About the film's values-judging three views without looking at social background is playing rascal. In the social situation of India, women do not have the atmosphere to choose their profession freely. They can only be established after breaking through. As the father said to his daughter in the movie-you are not fighting for you alone, you have to let ten million women in Qian Qian see that girls are not only able to teach their husbands and sons. In the end, the significance of this struggle has already transcended his father's own dream and sublimated.

movie_title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
title: Fairy Tales of Adults
review: After this movie changed director, the feeling is different. The rhythm is faster. Of course, the suspense is not as strong as the first two movies. The special effects have been improved a little. This is a typical children's work for adults.

title: The end
review: There is no favorite egg at the end of the movie. Many people have been waiting for a long time in the cinema, but they didn't wait for what they wanted. Later, some people said that there were colored eggs. It was the sound of making armor in the first part of iron man. There were 11 knocks, indicating that in the eleventh year of marvel, when I went to watch the film for the second time, I had to wait for a long time at the end of the film to listen to the sound...

title: no villain,only hero
review: Not to mention what the plot of the next movie will be, but for this avengers 3, there is no villain, only justice, no villain, only hero!

review: In the movie, I like Anna best. She is straightforward, lively, and loves her family. No matter what happens, Anna uses singing to drive it out. Anna loved her family and saved her sister with her last life. Anna's love for her sister melts her fear, and Elsa's love melts Anna's frozen magic. On the one hand, Elsa created all kinds of exquisite ice and snow, on the other hand, it is warm and unfreezing all the love and family relationship, so that we can be moved by the true love of their sisters in our hearts

title: hero
review: The film balances the roles of different heroes, with both individual performances and timely encounters, while adding to the human appeal. In terms of design, the most ingenious is the heroes who have no flight skills: the captain of the United States pursues the container car alone, the black widow drives the electric motorcycle to follow him, the eagle eye drives the plane to answer him, and the action design is not simple.

title: magic
review: James Cameron's Avatar is a masterpiece of art. From the very beginning, viewers are shown a plethora of beautiful images from the exotic land of Pandora, ranging from magical plants to the several stunning wild animals that roam the planet.Avatar deserves credit for its artistic achievements.

title: My heart will go on
review: The sinking of the Titanic made Jack and Rose Immortal in their love. The most beautiful love often has regrets. Without long-term love, the eternal love is gone. James Cameron tells us in a fragmentary form: believe in love. But at the same time, it also implies that without eternal love, no matter how beautiful love is, it can't rival life.

movie_title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
title: Porter's magical world has developed in a stunning fashion, sweeping the world.
review: As the beginning of HP series, it is qualified to complete the task, and the explanation to the characters is very clear. Among many other split HP books, this one is the most faithful expression of the extraordinary splendor of the magic world. While explaining the plot, it still does not forget the ghosts, moving portraits and stairs in the college, which were almost absent in the later books.

title: 'Beautiful Mind' provides a unique way of recognizing the luck and misfortune of genius.
review: The happiest person in the world can have more success than this. It is such a genius and lucky dog that still encounters all sorts of misfortunes asked by common people. This misfortune did not come from physical material poverty, nor did it come from the personal strife that genius most often suffered, but from the profound loneliness in his soul.

movie_title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
title: The Perfect Combination of Suspense and Fantasy
review: Since all the main characters appeared one after the other in the first movie, the second movie focuses on the plot. The most striking thing about the Harry Potter movies is that they balance the difficult problem between the novel readers and the new audience. They can not only follow the theme and meaning of the novel, but also attract the audience visually to the fullest extent, thus making this huge world view perfectly displayed in front of the audience.

title: Time changed
review: Girls also need superheroes to be their idols. She's not her girlfriend. She protects the world. She's different.
